tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Exercise,
review: We had our first baby this year and we started consultation with Dr. Diya Singhal. We were impressed with the first visit as she attended us nicely. She is a very calm , sweet, ************* and soft spoken doctor. She makes sure that the patient gets attended with the utmost care and he/she gets fully satisfied with his / her questions. She took every measure to make sure baby as well as the mother is fine all the time. She also suggests various doctors, physio which mothers need for normal delivery.  She does not believe in operation as her first preference is of normal delievery till last hope she makes sure that mother gets normal delievery. Not only her but her assistant Meenu as well is very co-operative and very knowledgeable. She is also very supportive and is available all the time. She always have a smile on her face. Overall the exeprience was superb and I  highly recommend Dr. Divya singhal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Divya is very experienced and deals in high risk pregnancy.
She has guided me very well throughout my journey. She also made normal delivery possible for me. Highly recommend her.
Meenu mam is also very good and guides very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a wonderful experience, I would rather say my best bcos it's been my second delivery with her as my first child was also delivered by her before 10 years in the year 2013 and thus year in June my second child was born. She doesn't treat u like a patient, rather she takes care of you like a mother n guides u the same way all the time, she makes you feel so comfortable whenever u visit her at her clinic for regular check up n follow ups, and the same way over the phone. I would say she is the best Gynaecologist/ Obstretician in the whole Delhi & NCR. I would recommend each & everyone to visit her if the want the bestest treatment. Thanks to her for giving me two beautiful gems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Best experience 
delivered my second baby now 
Both the babies are delivered by dr divya singhal mam . 
You are an amazing doctor and a wonderful person. Thank you for your support during some really tough times, as well as your encouragement to help me get to the best times in my life. I'm beyond thankful for my son and daughter. Words can't say how much I appreciate you but thank you so much for everything!
So happy üôèüèªüôèüèªüòäüòäü•∞

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I can‚Äôt even explain how I am happy with my doc.. she is just amazing.. she helped me a lot in my most precious journey I‚Äôve been waiting for‚Ä¶
But she is so awesome.. i wanted my pregnancy to be normal and she Help me in that as well.:: she is so supportive in my delivery‚Ä¶ Ill surely recommend doctor divya to all my friend and family members‚Ä¶ 
And I must say she has beautiful staff in her clinic‚Ä¶ 
The clinic is so nice and clean, staff is so friendly and helpful.. what else we want from our doc.. 
thank you so much dr divya‚Ä¶

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Post Pregnancy Classes,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,
review:
My experience with Dr Divya Singhal had been amazing,
I went to her for my second pregnancy.*** ** **** * **** *** ************* ***** the way she has guided me by giving proper diets, exercises and most importantly empathy and love , I am so thankful to her and to God.

I have never seen a person like her, post delivery she was calling my husband to enquire about my health and providing all the help and care.She was on her toes from the moment I got pains till the time I reached home, she is an extremely talented and helpful lady.

I have so much to share, can‚Äôt express everything here but believe me if you are looking for a gynaecologist you should definitely go to her.**** ** *** ******
Her clinic is very approachable and very well maintained.
Staff is outstanding and very courteous, specially Meenu Didi.She is a beautiful lady.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Divya ensures to give the best advice and treatment. The Clinic is well equiped with all facilities and is absolutely hygenic. Meenu didi is always ready to support and provide assistance to the patient. She too has been a great support along with Divya mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a wonderful experience throughout my pregnancy in terms of the motherly warmth during consultations with Dr. Divya, the constant follow ups from Meenu ma'am and services received from the clinic. Thank you for making this journey even more easy and comfortable than the first.
My first born was also delivered naturally by Dr. Divya. 
My deep regards and high recommendation for Dr. Divya.



Regards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been visiting Dr. Divya for 17 years now. After normal deliveries of my two kids, i was diagnosed with fibroids in uterus. She discussed in detail with us and we decided on hysterectomy. She is extremely caring and stayed in touch with us till late night after admission. Her aura automatically soothes the patient of any fear and her skill adds to the healing. No words can describe her as a doctor and a human. Thankful and grateful üôè

context: Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy,Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Delivery,
review:
Thank you doctor for all your support and guidance provided to bring our little bundle of joy in this worldüòä

We are very grateful  to Dr Divya and Meenu mam helping us to have a  very smooth journey throughout our pregnancy and to have a natural  delivery without any complications.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Divya Singhal for me is literally a goddess dressed in white coat. She has taken such good care of me.  Her sincere concern and reassurance really meant a lot to me.  I knew I was in her skilled hands and expertise. Meenu di- the lady who went beyond her limits to make me comfortable and tensionfree throughput the pregnancy. I have never seen such an awesome staff . They all are just marvellousüòç

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: She always recommended me the 'Gharelu Nushka' rather than giving me medicines! N this was the best part about her! She always guided me with the alternatives of what i was allergic to or did not like throughout my pregnancy! She patiently listened to my problems n then treated accordingly!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Family Planning,
review:
I got my daughter delivered by Dr Divya in September 2019 at Jaipur golden Hospital.
Doctor is so kind and understanding that throughout my pregnancy whenever i need her she was one call away. Always answered my calls and resolved my concerns. 
Ms Meenu ( her assistant) is so humble and good hearted person, she understands your concerns and show support in every concern. 
The clinic is so well maintained and hygiene.
She is still my gynaecologist and I would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Divya Singal is the best gyneoclogist I have ever known. She is deeply concerned about the patients. She treats all patients personally and provides genuine consultancy. I have delivered twins recently and she was always available during the complete journey.  She acts like a companion, mother, friend, doctor. She is very meditative and encourages patients to follow path of nature. I would recommend her for any advice related to gyneoclogist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: What gem of a Person Dr. Divya is. I had lost all Hope of conception but she never. Under her guidance I conceived which was a miracle in itself. I did not have enough eggs even for IVF but with her help I conceived naturally.she guided me all through my pregnancy,during  delivery and Post delivery. She never hides anything and explains the problem in layman's language. Her staff is very supportive and especially Meenu Ma'am. She takes personal interest in every patient and explains everything in detail. Overall my experience with Dr. Divya and her staff is satisfactory and would highly recommend her to everybody.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I have a superb experience with dr. Divya ma‚Äôam  she is god for me I have two child and both are normal delivery.  I went in OT in my 1st delivery but Divya ma‚Äôam did normal delivery and in my second delivery I got to knw I‚Äôm having sugar but ma‚Äôam handle my case very nicely and did normal delivery in 36 weak 4days my both delivery was in 36 weak  I specially go to ma‚Äôam clinic from Lajpat Nagar it takes 1hr but I want my 2nd baby delivery also done by Divya ma‚Äôam her hand are magical. 
 Thank u so much ma‚Äôam
And the staff of the clinic is very friendly Meenu didi,  didi u r very supportive and always keep u touch with Divya ma‚Äôam and talk so nicely even we call at night. Thank u Meenu didi

There was 2 miscarriages of me before I met with Dr. Divya Singhal madam as its a high risk pregnancy no other doctor taken my case but  she comes like God to me and now i am having a healthy baby Boy 
Thank you madam

Dr Divya is just awesome. She is wonderful an very much cooperative and check up her patients with patience. She is very experienced in her field.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great staff and service. Well maintained clinic. Doctor explained everything so well and me feel comfortable. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: **** ****** * ** **** ***** I m consulting her since 3-4 years, she is prime satisfaction anyone can have! Thanks to her! May god give her long and healthy life!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Consultancy fee is 900 {not 800} , overall experience is very good. 

Doctors will listen to your problem and suggest what is best for you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Divya is very experienced and a beautiful lady by heart and soul. I am connected with her from past 7 years. I have two beautiful daughters,both blessed by Dr Divya. Meenu di is very helpful there. She explains everything in a detailed manner. The best thing is that  they both are connected with you all time during your treatment/ procedure .
Doctor not able to recall the prescription written earlier and shared new concern for which no medication was prescribed. Rather the focus was to get in the infertility treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Friendly doctor who has listened very patiently . Satisfied with her consultation . Consulted her for UTI

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: She explained the issues if problem properly where the treatment is even not required. Guided me to the relevant derma specialist. I loved the way she gave enough time to understand my concerns and cleared the doubts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is very nice & my mother know her since 26 yrs ....my mother feels very fortunate that she delievered both of her daughters under her guidence.....she is just perfect..
